# Metamagic, Empower
## Overview
**Aura** strong (no school); **CL** 17th

**Slot** none

**Price** 32,500 gp

**Weight** 5 lbs.

**Description**

The wielder can cast up to three spells (from 1st to 6th level) per day that are empowered as though using the [[Empower Spell (Feat)|Empower Spell]] feat.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Rod (Feat)|Craft Rod]], [[Empower Spell (Feat)|Empower Spell]]

**Cost** 16,250 gp

**Source:** Core Rulebook, pg. 484
